00027 #include <Inventor/nodes/SoSubNode.h>
00028 #include <Inventor/fields/SoMFInt32.h>
00029 #include <Inventor/fields/SoSFEnum.h>
00030 #include <Inventor/elements/SoProfileElement.h>
00031 
00032 class SbVec2f;
00033 class SoState;
00034 
00035 class COIN_DLL_API SoProfile : public SoNode {
00036   typedef SoNode inherited;
00037 
00038   SO_NODE_ABSTRACT_HEADER(SoProfile);
00039 
00040 public:
00041   static void initClass(void);
00042 
00043   enum Profile {
00044     START_FIRST = SoProfileElement::START_FIRST,
00045     START_NEW = SoProfileElement::START_NEW,
00046     ADD_TO_CURRENT = SoProfileElement::ADD_TO_CURRENT
00047   };
00048 
00049   SoMFInt32 index;
00050   SoSFEnum linkage;
00051 
00052   virtual void doAction(SoAction * action);
00053   virtual void callback(SoCallbackAction * action);
00054   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00055   virtual void getBoundingBox(SoGetBoundingBoxAction * action);
00056   virtual void pick(SoPickAction * action);
00057   virtual void getPrimitiveCount(SoGetPrimitiveCountAction * action);
00058 
00059   virtual void getTrimCurve(SoState * state, int32_t & numpoints,
00060                             float *& points, int & floatspervec,
00061                             int32_t & numknots, float *& knotvector) = 0;
00062   virtual void getVertices(SoState * state, int32_t & numvertices,
00063                            SbVec2f *& vertices) = 0;
00064 
00065 protected:
00066   SoProfile(void);
00067   virtual ~SoProfile();
00068 };
00069
